incident_updates.body: Maintenance will begin as scheduled in 60 minutes.
Start time : 08/06/2023 07:00 UTC End time : 08/06/2023 08:00 UTC Service impact : None Service improvement : our teams will be adding capacity to our backbone infrastructure in Zurich.
Maintenance will begin as scheduled in 60 minutes.

scheduled_maintenances.name: [GRA1] [Loadbalancer] - Cluster027 - Cluster028 - Cluster030 - Cluster031 - Cluster026 - Cluster024 - Cluster025

incident_updates.body: Start time : 08/06/2023 09:30 UTC End time : 08/06/2023 12:30 UTC Service impact : Some latency will be observed. Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, our teams are going to upgrade our load balancer software. This update will be deployed for cluster027 - cluster028 - cluster030 - cluster031 - cluster026 - cluster024 - cluster025 in GRA1.
